vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rdmacror( unsigned short FlibHndl, short s_number, short e_number, short length, IODBMR *macror );

cmn.p: Reads the custom macro variable specified by "datano_s", "datano_e". The data is stored in "IODBMR" with signed binary format.
The kinds of custom macro variable are as follows.
cmn.ol:
Local variable (#1,..,#33) The local variables which belong to the macro program just being executed when the application program calls this function are read.
Common variable (#100,..,#999) See the description of cnc_rdmacroinfo function about the available range of common variables.
cmn.p: It is possible to exchange the type of macro variable by cnc_setmactype function.

tr.td:
value of variable (=M)
4-byte binary data with sign
(available range:999999999,..,-999999999)

number of places of decimals (=E)
2-byte binary data with sign
(available range:-128,..,127)

ul.p: mcr_val always returns by nine digits and adjusts the amount with the value of dec_val.
ul.blockquote:
Example: When the variable value is 12.345, mcr_val and dec_val are read as follows.
mcr_val = 123450000
dec_val = 7

tr.td:
numerical part of variable (=M)
4-byte binary data with sign
(available range:No limitation)

exponent part of variable (=E)
2-byte binary data with sign
(available range:-128,..,127)

cmn.p: The value of an undefined variable is called "vacant", and it is expressed as follows both at decimal form floating-point type and at binary form floating-point type.
See "OPERATOR'S MANUAL" of CNC for details of the custom macro variable.
